document_data.title: Crypt of the Dark Kiss
document_data.design: [[Ryan Wheaton]]{{Cite adventurers league/Crypt of the Dark Kiss|1}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Crypt of the Dark Kiss''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Waterdeep|Waterdeep]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Undermountain]], and is an adventure designed for 5{{th}}- to 10{{th}}-level characters. It is part two of the ''Vampire Hunt'' Trilogy.

{{Quote|''Are there actually vampires in Undermountain? The Baron of Blood demands that you find out!''|}}
